Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler, Listener, ServerMessageHandler, ViewChangeEventHandler
public class Client extends Object implements ServerMessageHandler, ViewChangeEventHandler
This class represents the client.
